GIR_Amount_EUR: C. ETR AND TOP-UP TAX RECONCILIATION

Line_Item: Total Top-Up Tax per Tax Provision

Reconciliation_ID: 1. Complete Section A for each jurisdiction - reconcile GloBE Income between GIR and tax provision/calculation
2. Complete Section B for each jurisdiction - reconcile Covered Taxes
3. Complete Section C for each jurisdiction - reconcile ETR and Top-Up Tax calculations
4. Complete Section D at group level - reconcile total allocations
5. Acceptable_Variance: TRUE if variance is immaterial (<5%) and explained; FALSE if further investigation needed
6. Document all variance explanations - these support audit defence
